item.title: PI Command Generator
item.dc:creator: @owner_nitro owner nitro
item.description:
@owner_nitro wrote:

[quote author=jamie0910 link=topic=486210.msg3566553#msg3566553 date=1302706958]

[quote=“owner nitro, post:17, topic:390298”]I realise that its not that amazing, i made it in just a few minutes but what i dont get is how everyone on moparsce thinks its a virus after i put up multiple videos of proof that it works and even post part of the code.
People tell me that its not good coding, but then say that i made it a virus (which means i must be good at coding, because i have no idea how to make one)… WTF, its imposible to just realease somthing without people claiming a bunch of bs on it

and jamie did you watch my 2nd youtube video, because i have norton, and i scanned it. It said it was clean, so idk wtf is wrong with your comp, but i can assure you that it wasnt my program (by the way if norton says its a threat it could be because its from an unidentified publisher)

edit:
http://img847.imageshack.us/i/errorjo.png/

I don’t see it as a virus, But Norton does, i’ll redownload and see maybe, because this can seem like a useful program for me to use.

Jamie[/quote]

I would just disable norton in the addons section of the browser, then download it and then re-enable it (I dont really like norton, so i leave it off all the time)

Read full topic

item.title: PI Command Generator
item.dc:creator: @jamie0910 jamie0910
item.description:
@jamie0910 wrote:

[quote author=owner nitro link=topic=486210.msg3565757#msg3565757 date=1302639423]
I realise that its not that amazing, i made it in just a few minutes but what i dont get is how everyone on moparsce thinks its a virus after i put up multiple videos of proof that it works and even post part of the code.
People tell me that its not good coding, but then say that i made it a virus (which means i must be good at coding, because i have no idea how to make one)… WTF, its imposible to just realease somthing without people claiming a bunch of bs on it

and jamie did you watch my 2nd youtube video, because i have norton, and i scanned it. It said it was clean, so idk wtf is wrong with your comp, but i can assure you that it wasnt my program (by the way if norton says its a threat it could be because its from an unidentified publisher)

edit:
http://img847.imageshack.us/i/errorjo.png/

I don’t see it as a virus, But Norton does, i’ll redownload and see maybe, because this can seem like a useful program for me to use.

Jamie

Read full topic

item.title: PI Command Generator
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

I highly doubt this is malicious. Well what you’ve done is kind of pointless, no offence. To me it seems to be a limited snippit manager. It would be more efficient to make a website for such. But if you want to make it a worthwhile program, have some options. Have input interfaces for the command name, rights needed to execute, then have some check boxes such as teleport, give item, spawn npc and such which bring up a prompt to input the IDs or coordinates of the item, npc and etc.

Read full topic
